Structs/ServiceLifecycle/Configuration.h.name: label
Structs/ServiceLifecycle/Configuration.h.abstract: Defines the label for the lifeycle and its Logger

Structs/ServiceLifecycle/Configuration.h.name: callbackQueue
Structs/ServiceLifecycle/Configuration.h.abstract: Defines the DispatchQueue on which startup and shutdown callback handlers are run.

Structs/ServiceLifecycle/Configuration.h.name: shutdownSignal
Structs/ServiceLifecycle/Configuration.h.abstract: Defines what, if any, signals to trap for invoking shutdown.

Structs/ServiceLifecycle/Configuration.h.name: installBacktrace
Structs/ServiceLifecycle/Configuration.h.abstract: Defines if to install a crash signal trap that prints backtraces.

Structs/ServiceLifecycle.html#/s:9Lifecy.name: startAndWait()
Structs/ServiceLifecycle.html#/s:9Lifecy.abstract: Starts the provided LifecycleTask array and waits (blocking) until a shutdown Signal is captured or shutdown is called on another thread.

Structs/ServiceLifecycle.html#/s:9Lifecy.name: shutdown(_:)
Structs/ServiceLifecycle.html#/s:9Lifecy.abstract: Shuts down the LifecycleTask array provided in start or startAndWait.

Structs/ServiceLifecycle.html#/s:9Lifecy.name: wait()
Structs/ServiceLifecycle.html#/s:9Lifecy.abstract: Waits (blocking) until shutdown Signal is captured or shutdown is invoked on another thread.

Structs/LifecycleShutdownHandler.html#/s.name: init(_:)
Structs/LifecycleShutdownHandler.html#/s.abstract: Initialize a LifecycleShutdownHandler based on a completion handler.

Structs/LifecycleShutdownHandler.html#/s.name: sync(_:)
Structs/LifecycleShutdownHandler.html#/s.abstract: Asynchronous LifecycleShutdownHandler based on a blocking, throwing function.

Structs/LifecycleStartHandler.html#/s:9L.name: init(_:)
Structs/LifecycleStartHandler.html#/s:9L.abstract: Initialize a LifecycleHandler based on a completion handler.

Structs/LifecycleStartHandler.html#/s:9L.name: sync(_:)
Structs/LifecycleStartHandler.html#/s:9L.abstract: Synchronous LifecycleStartHandler based on a blocking, throwing function.

Structs/LifecycleHandler.html#/s:9Lifecy.name: init(_:)
Structs/LifecycleHandler.html#/s:9Lifecy.abstract: Initialize a LifecycleHandler based on a completion handler.

Structs/LifecycleHandler.html#/s:9Lifecy.name: sync(_:)
Structs/LifecycleHandler.html#/s:9Lifecy.abstract: Asynchronous LifecycleHandler based on a blocking, throwing function.

Structs/LifecycleStartHandler.html.name: LifecycleStartHandler
Structs/LifecycleStartHandler.html.abstract: LifecycleHandler for starting stateful tasks. The state can then be fed into a LifecycleShutdownHandler

Structs/LifecycleShutdownHandler.html.name: LifecycleShutdownHandler
Structs/LifecycleShutdownHandler.html.abstract: LifecycleHandler for shutting down stateful tasks. The state comes from a LifecycleStartHandler

Structs/ServiceLifecycle.html.name: ServiceLifecycle
Structs/ServiceLifecycle.html.abstract: ServiceLifecycle provides a basic mechanism to cleanly startup and shutdown the application, freeing resources in order before exiting.

Protocols/LifecycleTask.html.name: LifecycleTask
Protocols/LifecycleTask.html.abstract: Represents an item that can be started and shut down

Protocols/LifecycleTasksContainer.html.name: LifecycleTasksContainer
Protocols/LifecycleTasksContainer.html.abstract: A container of LifecycleTask, used to register additional LifecycleTask

Classes/ComponentLifecycle.html#/s:9Life.name: startAndWait(on:)
Classes/ComponentLifecycle.html#/s:9Life.abstract: Starts the provided LifecycleTask array and waits (blocking) until shutdown is called on another thread.

Classes/ComponentLifecycle.html#/s:9Life.name: shutdown(_:)
Classes/ComponentLifecycle.html#/s:9Life.abstract: Shuts down the LifecycleTask array provided in start or startAndWait.

Classes/ComponentLifecycle.html#/s:9Life.name: wait()
Classes/ComponentLifecycle.html#/s:9Life.abstract: Waits (blocking) until shutdown is invoked on another thread.

Classes/ComponentLifecycle.html.name: ComponentLifecycle
Classes/ComponentLifecycle.html.abstract: ComponentLifecycle provides a basic mechanism to cleanly startup and shutdown a subsystem in a larger application, freeing resources in order before exiting.
